recipes.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Fry the minced beef with onion and garlic.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
instructions: Heat oil, add garlic, then vegetables.

recipes.name: Pancakes
instructions: Pour batter and cook until bubbles form.

recipes.name: Beef Tacos
ingredients:
minced
1 packet taco seasoning mix
3/4 cup water
Taco shells or tortillas
Toppings: shredded lettuce
recipes.instructions: To prepare beef tacos, begin by cooking the ground beef in a skillet over medium heat until browned, breaking it apart with a spoon. Add the chopped onion and minced garlic, cooking until the onion is translucent. Stir in the taco seasoning and water, simmering for about 5 minutes until the mixture thickens. Fill the taco shells or tortillas with the beef mixture and top with your favorite toppings like shredded lettuce, diced tomatoes, shredded cheese, sour cream, and salsa. Serve immediately and enjoy your delicious beef tacos!

recipes.name: Caesar Salad
ingredients:
grated
Caesar dressing
Black pepper
Optional: grilled chicken or shrimp
recipes.instructions: To make a Caesar salad, start by washing and chopping the romaine lettuce into bite-sized pieces. In a large bowl, combine the chopped lettuce with croutons. Drizzle Caesar dressing over the salad and toss everything to coat evenly. Then, sprinkle grated Parmesan cheese on top and add black pepper to taste. For an extra protein boost, you can also include grilled chicken or shrimp. Serve immediately and enjoy your delicious Caesar salad!

recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Mix in flour and chocolate chips.

recipes.name: Scrambled Eggs with Veggies
ingredients: Mixed vegetables (e.g., bell peppers, onions, spinach)
instructions: Pour eggs into the pan and scramble until cooked.

recipes.name: Chapati
ingredients: 2 cups of all-purpose flour or whole wheat flour
Water (enough to make a soft dough
Extra flour for dusting while rolling the chapati
recipes.instructions: To make chapati, combine 2 cups of whole wheat flour with ½ teaspoon of salt. Gradually add ¾ to 1 cup of water and knead until smooth. Let the dough rest for 20-30 minutes. Divide into small balls, roll into flat rounds, and cook on a hot skillet until puffy and golden. Serve warm with your favorite dishes.

recipes.name: Fried Chicken
recipes.instructions: To make fried chicken, season the chicken, dredge it in flour, and fry in hot oil until crispy and golden brown. Rest briefly, then serve.

recipes.name: Burgers
ingredients: 1 lb ground beef, 4 burger buns, 4 slices of cheese (optional), Lettuce leaves,Tomato slices, Pickles Ketchup, Mustard, Salt and pepper to taste, Butter or oil for grilling
recipes.instructions: Form the ground beef into 4 equal patties, season with salt and pepper, and grill them on medium-high heat for about 4-5 minutes on each side, or until they reach your desired doneness. During the last minute of cooking, place a slice of cheese on top of each patty to melt. Toast the buns on the grill until golden. Assemble the burger by placing the patty on the bun, then layering with lettuce, tomato, pickles, ketchup, mustard, or any preferred toppings.

recipes.name: Ugali Spinach Beef
ingredients: bring 4 cups of water to a boil in a large pot. Gradually add 2 cups of maize flour while stirring continuously to avoid lumps. Cook on medium heat
stirring until it thickens and pulls away from the sides of the pot. Once cooked
reduce the heat to low and cover for a few minutes.
recipes.instructions:
For the Nyama (meat), heat 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil in a pan over medium heat. Add 500g of your choice of meat (beef or goat) and brown it on all sides. Add one chopped onion, two chopped tomatoes, and season with salt, pepper, and your preferred spices. Cook until the meat is tender, adding water as needed.
For the spinach, heat a small amount of oil in a separate pan. Add a bunch of washed and chopped spinach, sautéing for about 5 minutes until wilted. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve Ugali with the Nyama and spinach on the side, allowing the flavors to blend together for a delicious, hearty meal!
